    Dplyr verbs

    Implementations of dplyr verbs that can be used to generate Substrait plans

    select(<SubstraitCompiler>) rename(<SubstraitCompiler>) rename_with(<SubstraitCompiler>) filter(<SubstraitCompiler>) mutate(<SubstraitCompiler>) transmute(<SubstraitCompiler>) arrange(<SubstraitCompiler>) group_by(<SubstraitCompiler>) ungroup(<SubstraitCompiler>) summarise(<SubstraitCompiler>) summarize(<SubstraitCompiler>) collect(<SubstraitCompiler>) relocate(<SubstraitCompiler>)
